name: trello-api-ts
description: TypeScript wrapper for the Trello API
author: Michael Wu <michael.yixuan.wu@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:node-modules
scripts.copy: npm run copy:package-json && npm run copy:readme && npm run copy:lib
scripts.copy:package-json: shx mkdir -p build && shx cp package.json build
scripts.copy:readme: shx mkdir -p build && shx cp README.md build
scripts.copy:lib: shx mkdir -p build && shx mkdir -p build/lib && shx cp -R src/lib/* build/lib
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run copy
